Myanmar (Phonetic order) Basic Change History

1.2.1 (2024-12-12)
------------------
* Update Padauk font

1.2 (2020-11-03)
------------------
* Add Padauk font to the package

* Remove English characters (abc... and ABC...)

----------------
* Keyman keyboard generated by ImportKeyboard from Windows 10 
* Touch layout added
